text: 3.13: Kis 3.6; 3.15; Mt 22.32; Ru 23.13-25; FG 2.23; 7.32Abraham gum Aisak, Zekop, nzan nzɨgir, Fhe Bakɨme, ana guigira zɨ bakɨmen won ŋaara guma Zisas ga nɨɨŋgi. Mba gumara, nde anan ana pana gumgi farve khɨngi. Mba tugen Pairat ana fhɨrgirim, ana ŋgɨr za mbuim, nde ana shashagiap, kɨr ana segap, khaŋ Pairat ga nzuai, ‘Pairat ndu ana fhɨrgirim ana ŋgɨ thari.’
